curriculum.title: Jesús Hernández - Curriculum Vitae
curriculum.aboutMe: Developer of mobile and web applications with knowledge in technical support and computer security.

digitalSecurity.degree: Junior in Digital Security and Data Protection

experience1.responsibilities: <item>Developed web and mobile application interfaces, collaborating with business stakeholders and backend developers. Integrated data and processes from external providers.</item><item>Refactored existing projects to ensure clean, maintainable, and efficient code.</item><item>Demonstrated the results of the work performed to the product owner and stakeholders.</item>
experience1.skills: Next.js, User Interface Design, UIX, React.js, Apollo GraphQL, Redux.js, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, Desarrollo web

experience2.responsibilities: <item>Created user interfaces based on design specifications from the UX team. Participated in a Scrum team implementing functionality as specified in user stories.</item><item>Supported quality control and backend development teams with testing, code reviews, and troubleshooting.</item>
experience2.skills: React Native, Java, Desarrollo de Android

experience3.responsibilities: <item>Performed maintenance and configuration of equipment and software.</item> <item>Taught computer science to elementary school students.</item> <item>Provided support to administrative staff.</item>
experience3.skills: Windows, Linux, Hardware Support, Hardware Diagnostics, Technical Support, IT Hardware Support

curriculum.softSkills: <item>Analytical skills</item><item>Ability to work individually and in a team</item><item>Observation and concentration</item><item>Adaptability</item><item>Self-learning</item><item>Proactive</item>
curriculum.codedWith: This CV was coded in ReactJS.
